project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Users can see 'message sent', 'delivered', and 'read' indicators
Supports group chats with up to 50 participants
dependencies: WebSocket or similar real-time communication protocol

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one and group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Video calls connect within 3 seconds of initiation under normal network conditions
Supports HD video quality with adaptive bitrate streaming
Allows up to 10 participants in a group video call
Provides mute/unmute and camera on/off controls
non_functional: End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: Assumed the requirement includes both one-to-one and group messaging/video calls, with encryption and scalability as key non-functional needs.
